sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨呈現典型的葉色褪綠及營養生長減弱。

sentences.english: Avocados are a good source of potassium, a mineral that helps regulate blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨也富含鉀元素，而鉀元素則幫助調節血壓。

sentences.english: Avocados have gotten a bad reputation as being high in fat.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨由於脂肪含量高而得不到好的聲譽。

sentences.english: Avocados, strawberries and blue berries were also hit hard.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨，草莓，藍漿果也遭受了很大的損失。

sentences.english: We produce Mexican best quality fresh Hass avocado.
sentences.chinese: 我們生產墨西哥高品質的新鮮哈斯鱷梨。

sentences.english: Peel and slice the avocado and add to bowl with watercress.
sentences.chinese: 把鱷梨去皮切薄片，和豆瓣菜一起放入碗中。

sentences.english: I eat half an avocado every day.
An egg-white spinach omelet with sliced avocado and some whole-grain toast will do the trick!
sentences.chinese: 蛋白菠菜蛋卷外加鱷梨片兒和全麥土司最好了。

sentences.english: Avocados are simple to cut using a knife and a spoon.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨是使用簡單，切割刀和勺子。

sentences.english: The avocado and coconut water will keep you hydrated and silky smooth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨和椰汁可以讓你的皮膚水潤光滑。

sentences.english: Useful tool designed for cutting uniform-sized cubes of avocado.
sentences.chinese: 爲將鱷梨切成相同尺寸的塊狀而設計的實用工具。

sentences.english: Toss arugula with fennel, add grapefruit and avocado, and gently toss.
sentences.chinese: 在茴香裏放入芝麻，添加葡萄柚和鱷梨，輕輕地攪拌。

sentences.english: Certified Organic Rosehip Oil , Coconut Fruit , Avocado , Olive.
sentences.chinese: 有機玫瑰果油，椰子果，鱷梨，橄欖。

sentences.english: Avocadoes and mushrooms can provide similar benefits.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨和蘑菇也有類似的效果。

sentences.english: Rice Bran , Certified Organic Rosehip Oil , Avocado.
sentences.chinese: 米糠，有機野玫瑰果油，鱷梨。

sentences.english: Avocado is a fruit that is a healthy source of monounsaturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨這種水果，是單一不飽和脂肪的健康來源。

definition: edible stem of Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo
